circumstances:
While cruising in a snowstorm, the pilot encountered a double engine failure and was therefore forced to attempt an emergency landing. While trying to land, the aircraft hit trees and crashed in a wooded area. A crew member was killed while both other occupants were injured. 
Crew:
F/Lt Norman Butler Worswick, pilot,
F/Sgt J. R. Payne, 
F/O Frank Reid Miller. †
